administration.action.entitywipe: Removing entities of <types> types from <worlds> worlds
administration.action.banip: Banning an IP from the server
administration.action.unbanip: Unbanning an IP address from the server
administration.broadcast.smite: <red><player> has been a naughty, naughty boy.
administration.kick.message: <red>You have been kicked from the server.<newline>By: <yellow><by></yellow><reason>
administration.shutdown.message: <green>The server is going offline, come back in about a minute.
administration.command.adminchat.enabled: <info>Your chat messages from now on will be sent to the admin chat.
administration.command.adminchat.disable: <info>Your chat messages from now on will no longer be sent to the admin chat
administration.command.banip.invalid_ip_: <error>That is not a valid IP address.
administration.command.multirun.blacklis: <error>Did you really think that was going to work?

administration.command.multirun.too_exce: <error>That amount would, in all likelihood, crash the server.
administration.command.sudo.immune: <error>You can't perform commands as that user.

administration.command.wildcard.blacklis: <error>Did you really think that was going to work?
